abstract: Shabab militants attack bus in Mandera, Kenya, killing two people; passengers say they refused militants' demands to identify Christians on bus.
lead_paragraph: Somali militants sprayed a Kenyan bus with bullets on Monday, killing two people.

headline.main: Kenya: Bus Passengers Defy Militants Seeking to Target Christians in Attack
headline.print_headline: Africa; Kenya: Bus Passengers Defy Militants Seeking to Target Christians in Attack

snippet: Somali militants sprayed a Kenyan bus with bullets on Monday, killing two people.
